repository.comment: repository from which the dataset is taken

zip_path.comment: where to put the downloaded dataset

image_size.comment: all images are resized to this resolution

class_path.comment: path to the the model that will be used

model_path.comment: path on which the model will be saved

print_no_params.comment: should the number of trainable parameters be printed when the train starts

epoch_log_path.comment: where the log (for each epoch) should be done, false for no logging

step_log_path.comment: where the log (for each step) should be done, false for no logging

verbose.comment: should logging steps be printed on std output

restore.comment: should a stored model be loaded? when testing should be true

mini_step_size.comment: how many step to do before a gradient update

batch_size.comment: number of batches to be used during training

end_epoch.comment: for how many epoch should be the model trained

random_seed.comment: seed to be used for all random initialization

device.comment: cuda:0 for gpu training, cpu for cpu training

show_images.comment: true if should step-by-step mode should be used, images will be displayed

steps_to_reload.comment: how many mini_step should be done before reloading the configuration
